review_text: The cream seems to freeze the the sides really quickly, which makes the top do this crazy clunky noise that seems.... wrong. Plus the ice cream doesn't always turn out perfect. Which could be a user error.... So keep that in mind!
summary: The ice cream maker makes clunky noises and doesn't always work correctly
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
